moves.name: Thunder Punch
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: Keep it Up!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks. Applies the Gradual Healing effect to the user.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.effect: Removes the Physical and Special Damage Reduction effects from the opponents’ field of play.

passives.name: Wide Awake
passives.description: Prevents the user from falling asleep.

passives.name: Stamina Reserves 2
passives.description: Charges the user’s move gauge by 2 the first time it is in a pinch each battle.

passives.name: Paralysis Synergy 3
passives.description: Powers up the user’s moves when the target is paralyzed.
